name: A tattered charnel moth wing
data: It increases the users constitution a bit.
It increases the users wisdom pitifully.
It increases the users intelligence pitifully.
It has average armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration slightly.
This item loses its magical powers a bit faster than avarage.
It increases the users poison resistance somewhat.
It increases the users psionic resistance somewhat.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance somewhat.
